purge

public void purge(java.lang.String name)
Purge will delete NPCs and Objects in a room. Command 'purge room' Purge can also remove players. 'purge ' will make the player drop everything in their inventory and then be reset back to the start location of the game

Parameters:
name - Either 'room' or the name of a user

reCast

public void reCast(java.lang.String username)
Randomizes the Str, Int, Dex, etc. of a player. These stats are randomly generated when a player is created. This command will regenerate the base stats

Parameters:
username - Name of the user

healingLight

username - The name of the user

Shows any number of stats. NPCs in rooms, room names, user stats, etc.

command - The object to get stats on
